s-1.ptxt: CHECK STEERING PAD (VEHICLE NOT INVOLVED IN COLLISION)

s2.ptxt: Perform a diagnostic system check (See page ).
With the steering pad installed on the vehicle, perform a visual check. If there are any defects as mentioned below, replace the steering pad with a new one:
Cuts, minute cracks or marked discoloration on the steering pad top surface or in the grooved portion.

s-1.ptxt: CHECK STEERING PAD (VEHICLE INVOLVED IN COLLISION AND AIRBAG HAS NOT DEPLOYED)

s2.ptxt: Perform a diagnostic system check (See page ).
With the steering pad removed from the vehicle, perform a visual check. If there are any defects as mentioned below, replace the steering pad or steering wheel with a new one:

item.ptxt: Cuts, minute cracks, or marked discoloration on the steering pad.
Cracks or other damage to the connectors.
Deformation or cracks in the steering pad contact plate.

atten2.ptxt: For removal and installation of the steering pad assembly, be sure to follow the correct procedure.
